is.merkor.core
Interface ItemDictionary

All Known Implementing Classes:
RedisItemDictionary
public interface ItemDictionary

An interface for the access of Items.

Version:
0.8
Author:
Anna B. Nikulasdottir

Method Summary
 java.util.List<? extends Item> getAllItems()
          Returns all Items available in the MerkOr datasource used.
 java.util.List<? extends Item> getItemsFor(java.lang.String lemma)
          Retrieve all Items having lemma as attribute lemma.
 java.util.List<? extends Item> getItemsFor(java.lang.String lemma, java.lang.String wordclass)
          Retrieve all Items having lemma as attribute lemma and wordclass as wordclass (part-of-speech).
 java.util.List<? extends Item> getItemsMatching(java.lang.String regex)
          Retrieve all Items where attribute lemma matches regex.
 

Method Detail

getAllItems

java.util.List<? extends Item> getAllItems()
Returns all Items available in the MerkOr datasource used.

Returns:
a List of Items

getItemsFor

java.util.List<? extends Item> getItemsFor(java.lang.String lemma)
Retrieve all Items having lemma as attribute lemma. If the lemma has only one sense and wordclass, only one item will be found, otherwise one item for each sense and wordclass will be returned.

Parameters:
lemma - the lemma to retrieve Items for, may not be null or empty.
Returns:
a List of Items having lemma as lemma, or empty List if nothing is found.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if param is null or empty.

getItemsFor

java.util.List<? extends Item> getItemsFor(java.lang.String lemma,
                                           java.lang.String wordclass)
Retrieve all Items having lemma as attribute lemma and wordclass as wordclass (part-of-speech). If the lemma has only one sense, only one item will be found, otherwise one item for each sense will be returned.

Parameters:
lemma - the lemma to retrieve Items for, may not be null or empty.
wordclass - the part-of-speech of the lemma to search for, may not be null or empty.
Returns:
a List of Items having lemma as lemma, or empty List if nothing is found.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if param is null or empty.

getItemsMatching

java.util.List<? extends Item> getItemsMatching(java.lang.String regex)
Retrieve all Items where attribute lemma matches regex.

Parameters:
regex - the regular expression to match against lemma
Returns:
a List of items having lemma matching regex, or empty List if no match is found
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if param is null
